text: mme mo malatsing a mararo le sephatlo mebele ya bone e tlaa bewa mo pepeneneng mo mebileng ya Jerusalema (motse o o bolelwang sentle jaaka “Sodoma” kgotsa “Egepeto”), lefelo tota le Morena wa bone o bapoletsweng mo go lone. Ga go na ope yo o tlaa letlelelwang go ba fitlha, mme batho ba ba tswang mo merafeng e le mentsi ba tlaa phuthega go tla go ba bona.
